                                              SECTION A

Answer one of the following questions. Write at least 50 words.

1.   Next week there is going to be a swimming competition for all the schools in your region. You are
     the captain of your school swimming team. Send the members of the team an email explaining how
     the day is going to be organized.

     Remind the students about:
     • the date of the competition
     • where they must meet to leave for the competition
     • how they are going to travel to the competition
     • what they should bring to wear and to eat.

2.   As part of the creativity, action, service (CAS) programme you visit a home for old people every
     week. You would like more students to take part in this. Write the message for the school notice
     board in which you:

     •   say where the home for old people is situated
     •   say when the students visit the home
     •   name two activities that students can do to help old people when they are at the home
     •   encourage students to participate in this service.

4.   You have recently read an article about a “get to know your neighbour day”. You think this is an
     excellent idea and decide to organize a picnic in the local park to help people meet their neighbours.
     Write the blog you are going to post to advertise the event. Give the details of the picnic and explain
     why it is important to know your neighbours.
